name: Product Management
description: General Product Management profile with focus on product strategy, development, and stakeholder management

template_placeholders.ProfileSummary: Experienced Product Manager with expertise in product strategy, development, and stakeholder management. Proven track record of delivering successful products through data-driven decision making and cross-functional collaboration.
TopBullets: Led product strategy and roadmap development for multiple successful products, resulting in 25% increase in user engagement
Managed cross-functional teams of 8+ members across engineering, design, and marketing to deliver products on time and within budget
Conducted comprehensive market research and competitive analysis to identify new product opportunities and market gaps
Implemented data-driven product analytics and A/B testing frameworks, improving conversion rates by 15%
Established strong stakeholder relationships and communication channels, ensuring alignment across all departments
template_placeholders.SkillList: Product Strategy, Product Development, Roadmapping, Feature Prioritization, Market Research, Competitive Analysis, Product Analytics, Stakeholder Management, Cross-functional Collaboration, Communication, Problem Solving, Analytical Thinking, Business Acumen, Strategic Thinking, User Research, A/B Testing, KPI Definition, Product Lifecycle Management, Agile, Scrum
template_placeholders.SoftwareList: Jira, Confluence, Notion, Figma, Google Analytics, Mixpanel, Amplitude, Tableau, Power BI, Looker, Slack, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Miro, Trello, Asana, ClickUp, Monday.com
template_placeholders.ATSRecommendations: Product Manager with 5+ years experience in product strategy, development, and stakeholder management. Expertise in agile methodologies, data analytics, and cross-functional team leadership.
